rows.label: campfev11_380_170_msg0001
rows.name:
So Metsu aims to strike at Aurium.
The very heart of Iira...

rows.label: campfev11_380_170_msg0003
rows.name: Certainly. I'm anxious to get there.

rows.label: campfev11_380_170_msg0004
rows.name: But the capital is a long way off.

rows.label: campfev11_380_170_msg0005
rows.name:
Distant indeed.
We must cross Lett Bridge and then
traverse the Dannagh Desert.

rows.label: campfev11_380_170_msg0007
rows.name:
We'd better rest up and make sure
we're fully prepared before we go.

rows.label: campfev11_380_170_msg0008
rows.name:
Wise counsel! Let us be mindful, for
fatal errors can be made in haste.
